original_text: Then she told him this story: ‘The Hebrew slave that you brought to us tried to insult me. He wanted to sleep with me.
korean_text: 이 말로 그에게 말하여 이르되 당신이 우리에게 데려온 히브리 종이 나를 희롱하려고 내게로 들어왔으므로

sentences.original_text: Then she told him this story:
The Hebrew slave that you brought to us
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리에게 데려온 그 히브리 종은

sentences.original_text: He wanted to sleep with me.
